title: Web Developer Intern
description:
Web Developer Intern (Paid)
 



 Company: ZenithByte
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Duration: 3 Months
 



 Application Deadline: 30th December 2025
 



 Opportunity: Full\\-time role based on performance \\+ Certificate of Internship
 



  





 About ZenithByte
 



 ZenithByte provides students and graduates with practical, hands\\-on experience in web development. We aim to empower aspiring developers by offering real\\-world, client\\-based projects that strengthen technical skills and build professional portfolios. Our mission is to bridge the gap between theoretical learning and industry\\-ready expertise.
 



  





 Responsibilities
 



 Assist in designing and developing responsive, user\\-friendly websites.
 



 Work with front\\-end and back\\-end frameworks to develop dynamic web applications.
 



 Test, debug, and optimize code for performance and seamless user experience.
 



 Collaborate with senior developers and designers on live projects.
 



 Learn and apply modern tools and technologies to improve development efficiency.
 



  





 Requirements
 



 Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
 



 Familiarity with frameworks like React, Angular, or Node.js (preferred).
 



 Basic knowledge of UI/UX principles and responsive design concepts.
 



 Strong communication, teamwork, and time\\-management skills.
 



 Passion for learning and building creative, functional web solutions.
 



  





 Stipend \\& Benefits
 



 Stipend: ‚Çπ7,500 \\- ‚Çπ15,000 (Performance\\-Based) (Paid)
 



 Hands\\-on experience with real\\-world web development projects.
 



 Certificate of Internship \\& Letter of Recommendation upon completion.
 



 Opportunity to build a strong professional portfolio with live project exposure.
 



  





 Equal Opportunity Statement
 



 ZenithByte is an equal\\-opportunity employer. We welcome applicants from all backgrounds and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive work environment.

title: Sofwtare Developer
description:
**Company Description** 




 RDEG Software Services offers expertise in developing and supporting software applications across various domains including ERP, CRM, Inventory Management, Healthcare, Retail, Electronics, Embedded Systems, IoT, and AI/ML applications. We specialize in providing tailored solutions for diverse industries, ensuring efficiency and innovation. By leveraging advanced technologies, RDEG emphasizes delivering high\\-quality, scalable, and reliable software solutions. Our commitment is to empower businesses to achieve their goals through cutting\\-edge software engineering.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full\\-time hybrid Software Developer role, based in Paramakudi, with flexibility for some work\\-from\\-home arrangements. The Software Developer will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining software applications. Key daily tasks include coding, debugging, and testing to ensure robust application functionality, as well as collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to refine software requirements and address technical challenges.
 



  





**Qualifications** 




 Experience 6 months to 2 years
 



 Skills : Python / PHP / MERN, FrontEnd, BackEnd
 



 Location: Paramakudi, Hosur
 



  




* Strong foundational knowledge in Computer Science and software development principles.
* Proficiency in Back\\-End Web Development and experience in programming languages such as Python, PHP, MERN
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and ability to work collaboratively in hybrid environments.
* Experience with any of the following domains is a plus: ERP, CRM, Embedded Systems, IoT, or AI/ML applications.
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.

title: MEP Project Engineer
description:
We are seeking an
 **MEP Engineer** 
 to join our team of affordable group housing project.
 



  





 The MEP Engineer will be responsible for
 **supervising** 
 and
 **coordinating** 
 all
 ***mechanical, electrical, and plumbing***
 (MEP) engineering activities .
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




  




* **Supervise**
 the design and installation of MEP systems for the project, including
 **HVAC, plumbing, electrical, and fire protection systems.**



  




* Ensure
 **compliance**
 with local and national regulations, codes, and standards governing MEP systems.



  




* **Collaborate**
 with architects, contractors, and other stakeholders to develop and implement design plans that meet project requirements.



  




* **Conduct**
 site surveys and investigations to identify potential issues and develop appropriate solutions.



  




* **Develop**
 and manage project budgets and timelines, and ensure that all MEP activities are completed on time and within budget.



  




* **Provide**
 technical support and guidance to site staff, contractors, and other stakeholders.



  




* **Monitor**
 and
 **report**
 on the progress of MEP works, and adjust plans and schedules as needed to meet project goals.



  




* Ensure the
 **safety**
 of all workers on the project site, and implement appropriate safety measures.



  





 Qualifications:
 



  




* Bachelor's degree in Mechanical, Electrical, or Plumbing Engineering or a related field.
* Minimum of 5 years of experience in MEP engineering, with a focus on construction projects.
* Knowledge of local and national regulations, codes, and standards governing MEP systems.
* Experience managing budgets, schedules, and resources on construction projects.
* Strong communication, collaboration, and leadership skills.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Proficiency in AutoCAD and other relevant software.



  





 If you are a skilled MEP Engineer with a passion for group housing projects, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity. We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as the chance to work on meaningful projects that make a positive impact on communities.

title: Sr. Salesforce Developer ‚Äì  6‚Äëmonth contract, Remote
description:
**Senior Salesforce Developer (8\\+ Years Experience)** 




**Location:** 
 Bangalore\\-Remote
 



**Employment Type:** 
 Contract
 



 ¬†
 



 We are seeking a seasoned Senior Salesforce Developer with a proven track record of building scalable, secure, and business\\-driven Salesforce solutions. The ideal candidate combines deep technical expertise with the ability to collaborate across teams, ensuring Salesforce is leveraged as a true enabler of growth and efficiency.
 



 ¬†
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* **Solution Design \\& Development**
* Architect, design, and develop Apex classes, triggers, Lightning Web Components (LWC), and Visualforce pages.
* Build and integrate REST/SOAP APIs, middleware tools, and third\\-party applications to extend Salesforce functionality.
* Ensure clean, reusable, and optimized code through peer reviews and adherence to Salesforce best practices.
* **Collaboration \\& Stakeholder Engagement**
* Partner with business stakeholders, product owners, and architects to translate requirements into technical solutions.
* Provide technical leadership and mentor junior developers.
* **DevOps \\& Deployment**
* Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines using Gearset, Copado, or Jenkins.
* Drive automation and efficiency in deployment processes.
* **Governance \\& Security**
* Ensure compliance with Salesforce security model, data architecture, and governance standards.
* Proactively identify risks and recommend scalable solutions.



 ¬†
 



**Required Skills \\& Qualifications** 








* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
* 8\\+ years of Salesforce development experience with strong command of Apex, SOQL, SOSL, LWC, Visualforce, and Salesforce APIs.
* Hands\\-on experience with Salesforce integrations (REST/SOAP, middleware tools like MuleSoft or Dell Boomi).
* Solid understanding of Salesforce security, data modeling, and performance optimization.
* Strong analytical, problem\\-solving, and communication skills.
* Salesforce Administrator and Platform Developer I certification (mandatory).
* Platform Developer II or other advanced Salesforce certifications (preferred).








**Preferred Experience** 



* Expertise in Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, and Experience Cloud.
* Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies and tools like Jira or Azure DevOps.
* Experience with AppExchange solutions (Conga, DocuSign, CPQ).
* Exposure to enterprise\\-scale Salesforce implementations with multi\\-cloud integrations.



**Why Join Us** 



* Opportunity to lead high\\-impact Salesforce initiatives across IT, Finance, and emerging tech domains.
* Work in a collaborative, innovation\\-driven environment with global exposure.
* Shape the future of Salesforce adoption by driving automation, scalability, and business transformation.



 ¬†Share resume at bharti.shivhare@brihatisglobal.com\\-call Sudheer\\-\\+91 96639 20022
